name: NSSpellChecker.CorrectionResponse
desc: The correction response passed to therecord(_:toCorrection:forWord:language:inSpellDocumentWithTag:) method.

items.name: case edited
items.desc: After the correction was accepted, the user edited the corrected word (to something other than its original form.

items.name: case ignored
items.desc: The user continued in such a way as to ignore the correction.

items.name: case none
items.desc: No response was received from the user.

items.name: case rejected
items.desc: The user rejected the correction by dismissing the correction indicator.

items.name: case reverted
items.desc: After the correction was accepted, the user reverted the correction back to the original word.
